1625100.name: TempleFight
1625100.description:
Temple Fight is a An action game which talks about somebody which lost his father while fighting with the ghost and there soldier and he wants
to Take revenge for his father so he will fight the ghosts and their soldier could you help him? it will me something hard you will have to fight four soldier
And the Ghost among 25 levels every level contains enemies when you get deeper you find a ghost then when kill all the ghost you will return and fight
the them again with their solders and then toy will fight all the ghosts with there solders to take revenge of your father
